item.title: flairR: An R Wrapper for Accessing Flair NLP Tagging Features
item.author: Author
item.description: We are testing our package, an R wrapper for accessing Flair NLP, which allows for the use of core features such as part-of-speech tagging, NER, and sentiment analysis. Feel free to fork and submit pull requests or me know how you think of the package. Website: https://github.com/davidycliao/flaiR Github: davidycliao.github.io/flaiR
